abstract: Tulsa County, Okla, Sheriff Stanley Glanz indicates he will request judicial dismissal of petition signed by 6,647 citizens calling for a grand jury investigation of his role in fatal shooting of unarmed black man Eric Harris by volunteer deputy Robert Bates in April; organizers of petition say grand jury is their only hope for justice after Glanz refused mounting calls for him to step down.
lead_paragraph: Sheriff Stanley Glanz indicated that he will ask a judge to void a petition signed by 6,647 citizens seeking an inquiry into the shooting of an unarmed man.

headline.main: Tulsa Sheriff to Try to Block Petition for a Grand Jury Investigation
headline.print_headline: Tulsa Sheriff to Try to Prevent Grand Jury in Shooting

snippet: Sheriff Stanley Glanz indicated that he will ask a judge to void a petition signed by 6,647 citizens seeking an inquiry into the shooting of an unarmed man.
